response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer represents an exceptional value, allowing you to secure this remarkable asset at a discount compared to its true worth. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1150000}
